title: How did Jennifer Aniston break Instagram?
text:
Forget Kim Kardashian, it’s Jen’s turn to break the internet now (Picture: David Livingston/Getty Images)

Jennifer Aniston may have first appeared on our screens over 30 years ago, but the star is still causing as much of a buzz now as she did back in the early days of her glittering career.

Despite everyone’s interest in the 50-year-old Hollywood A-lister, the former Friends star is notoriously private about her personal life and didn’t even have a social media presence – until now.

But with her debut on Instagram barely a day old, how has the star already broken the social media platform?

How did Jennifer Aniston break Instagram?

Jennifer Aniston finally joined Instagram this week, making her presence known on the platform by posting a slightly blurry, low-res pic of none other than her former co-stars from Friends.

‘And now we’re Instagram FRIENDS too. HI INSTAGRAM,’ Jen captioned her first ever Instagram post, showing the six actors cosied up together and smiling for the camera.

The combination of Jen’s decision to finally join Instagram, combined with picture evidence (no matter how poor quality) of the Friends reunion that fans have been asking for literally since the show finished back in 2004, was clearly too much for the internet.

After the photo went live, fans flocked to follow the star and like and comment on her photo in such numbers that the platform temporarily crashed.

Jennifer’s new Instagram account racked up hundreds of thousands of followers within hours and at the time of writing, the actress has 11.4 million followers already – despite only setting her account up less than 48 hours ago.

No wonder she broke Instagram.

Poking fun at the effect she had on the social media platform, Jen uploaded a second post on the platform yesterday. The clip, taken from the first episode of her new series The Morning Show, shows Jen angrily throwing her phone across a table. The actress captioned the post: ‘I swear I didn’t mean to break it… Thank you guys for the kind, glitchy welcome.’

Join over 11 million other people in following the star at @jenniferaniston on Instagram.
